title: Long URL
content:

When I use Chrome and enter the same link it is much shorter and looks likeÂ :- https://www.facebook.com/JournalTimes/posts/10166569792420602 As I post a lot of links I prefer to use the shortest. How can I get Firefox to display the url the same as Chrome.

Thank You, Anne Lionnet
